data.title: Nemanja Stankovic, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Nemanja Stankovic stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Nemanja Stankovic - Points

Nemanja Stankovic scores a career high 31 points (2024)

On April 27, 2024, Nemanja Stankovic set his career high in points in a Bosnia - Division I game. That day he scored 31 points in KK Prijedor's road loss against Leotar Trebinje, 100-95. He also had 4 rebounds, 7 assists, 1 steal. He shot 8/11 from two, 1/5 from three, shooting at 56.3% from the field. He also shot 12/12 from the free-throw line.

Nemanja Stankovic - Rebounds

Nemanja Stankovic grabs a career high 9 rebounds (2024)

On April 24, 2024, Nemanja Stankovic set his career high in rebounds in a Bosnia - Division I game. That day he grabbed 9 rebounds in KK Prijedor's home win against Orlovik, 104-84. He also had 15 points, 6 assists, 1 steal.

Nemanja Stankovic - Assists

Nemanja Stankovic gives a career high 10 assists (2024)

On January 14, 2024, Nemanja Stankovic tied his career high in assists in a Bosnia - Division I game. That day he dished 10 assists in KK Prijedor's home loss against HKK Siroki, 69-91. He also had 13 points, 1 rebound, 3 steals.

Nemanja Stankovic - Steals

Nemanja Stankovic has a career high 3 steals (2024)

On January 14, 2024, Nemanja Stankovic tied his career high in steals in a Bosnia - Division I game. That day he reached 3 steals in KK Prijedor's home loss against HKK Siroki, 69-91. He also had 13 points, 1 rebound and 10 assists.

Nemanja Stankovic - Blocks

Nemanja Stankovic blocks a career high 1 shot (2024)

On March 26, 2024, Nemanja Stankovic set his career high in blocks in a Bosnia - Division I game. That day he went for 1 block in KK Prijedor's road win against Borac Nektar, 72-74. He also had 14 points, 4 rebounds and 2 assists.

Nemanja Stankovic - Efficiency

Nemanja Stankovic records a career high 30 efficiency rating (2024)

On April 27, 2024, Nemanja Stankovic set his career high in efficiency in a Bosnia - Division I game. That day he accomplished 30 efficiency in KK Prijedor's road loss against Leotar Trebinje, 100-95. He also had 31 points, 4 rebounds and 7 assists.
